item.name: printairhtml
item.title: Print using Adobe Air printJob interface- HTML content
item.description: This example uses Adobe Air Javascript APIs to print. Forces the Print Option window to open up. uses HTML content to print. I haven't found a way to sent the print job silently

item.name: printairpdfremote
item.title: Print using Adobe Air printJob interface- Remote PDF content
item.description: This example uses Adobe Air Javascript APIs to print. Forces the Print Option window to open up. uses HTML content to print.

item.name: printairpdflocal
item.title: Print using Adobe Air printJob interface- local PDF content

item.name: printairpdflocaljsinjected
item.title: Print using Adobe Air printJob interface - local PDF content with JS injected
item.description: PDF has js code injected in it to print silently. Javascript on the page communicates with the PDF javascript by sending messages.

item.name: savepdftofoldersilent
item.title: Save streamed file to folder silently
